fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Active Members by Type
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to count active members and break them down by membership type with a table visualization. Simple aggregation with grouping.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me how many active members we have, broken down by membership type in a chart. I'd like to be able to click on any membership type to see the actual list of members in that category.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing membership types and counts
Only active members are included in the count
All major membership types are represented (Individual, Corporate, Student, etc.)
Total count is reasonable (300-500 active members expected)
Chart supports drill-down to see member details for each type
Drilled-down table allows opening individual member records
